thread.title: Microsoft: More New Xbox One Experience Invitations Are Coming Every Day
thread.title_full: Microsoft: More New Xbox One Experience Invitations Are Coming Every Day - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Microsoft: More New Xbox One Experience Invitations Are Coming Every Day
text: Microsoft confirms that it's now rolling out invitations for Xbox Live Preview members who signed up to test the New Xbox One Experience every single day until all those who want to try it out are able to do so. The Xbox One got monthly firmware updates shortly after it made its debut back in November of 2013. While most of the new software versions brought improvements and enhancements, the biggest one yet is set to roll out in November, in the form of the New Xbox One Exp... Â»
